Translations.Text: Uss jannat ki sift jiss ka wada perhezgaron ko diya gaya hai yeh hai kay uss key neechay nehren beh rahi hain. Uss ka mewa hameshgi wala hai aur uss ka saya bhi. Yeh hai anjam perhezgaron ka aur kafiron ka anjam kaar dozakh hai

Jinhen hum ney kitab di hai woh to jo kuch aap per utara jata hai uss say khush hotay hain aur doosray fiqay iss ki baaz baaton say munkir hain. Aap ailaan ker dijiye kay mujhay to sirf yehi hukum diya gaya hai kay mein Allah ki ibadat keroon aur uss kay sath shareek na keroon mein ussi ki taraf bula raha hun aur ussi ki janib mera lotna hai

Issi tarah hum ney iss quran ko arabi zaban ka farman utara hai. Agar app ney inn ki khuwaishon ki pairwi kerli iss kay baad kay aap kay pass ilm aa chuka hai to Allah (kay azabon) say aap ko koi himayati milay ga aur na bachaney wala

Hum aap say pehlay bhi boht say rasool bhej chukay hain aur hum ney unn sab ko biwi bachon wala banaya tha kissi rasool say nahi hosakta kay koi nishani baghair Allah ki ijazat kay ley aaye her muqarrara waday ki aik likhat hai
Allah jo chahaye mita dey aur jo chahaye sabit rakhay loh-e-mehfooz ussi kay pass hai
Inn say kiye huye wadon mein say koi agar hum aap ko dikha den ya aap ko hum fot ker len to aap per to sirf phoncha dena hi hai. Hisab to humaray zimmay hi hai
Kiya woh nahi dekhtay? Kay hum zamin ko iss kay kinaron say ghatatay chalay aarahey hain Allah hukum kerta hai koi uss kay ehkaam peechay dalney wala nahi woh jald hisab leney wala hai

Inn say pehlay logon ney bhi apni makkari mein kami na ki thi lekin tamam tadbeeren Allah hi ki hain jo shaks jo kuch ker raha hai Allah kay ilm mein hai. Kafiron ko abhi maloom hojaye ga kay (uss) jahaan ki saza kiss kay liye hai
